Name: Puzzle - STONE BLOCKS
About the game: This is interesting logical game for meditation. The task of the game is to fill the empty space with stones located around the playing field. To move the figure use the LEFT mouse button, and to rotate the figure use the RIGHT mouse. If you like it, then you can buy additional level packs in other locations. Now the add-on is ready: - Greece - Persia - Rome - Mayan - BigMix #1 /
